documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet / inmate roster
summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 31, 2019. It records the official inmate population count and unit assignments for that date, which is significant as it is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 760 inmates verified against a count of 759.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 31, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It records an official inmate population count showing a total census of 760 inmates.
The count sheet includes unit-level breakdowns (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative record for tracking inmate location and population.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text, only unit assignments and counts.
